title: Suggestion
description:
To improve scalability, you might want to take advantage of the Tagging system...

You could Tag each page with either "Affirmative" or "Negative", then link to the Tag set using
"opencaselist.wikispaces.com/tag/view/Affirmative" and "opencaselist.wikispaces.com/tag/view/Negative" to retrieve each list, respectively.

It would greatly reduce the size of your menu and simplify updates, since each addition would be added to the lists automatically upon Tagging.

You can see an example here.

Cheers! - romzombie Jan 17, 2007
